And down the road, Housing... In the Housing|Village, you'll need to purchase land and a|house kit to own your own home in this world!|
|First, check out the sign in front of the|land to purchase a plot... There are two|sizes of land, "S" and "M"... Both sizes drop|
|in price four times a day, at 3:00 AM, 9:00|AM, 3:00 PM, and 9:00 PM. Size S starts at|500,000 gold... Prices drop in increments of|
|5,000 gold, with the lowest price at 20,000|gold... Sold price: 2,000 gold... Size|medium, from 2,500,000 gold... Price drops by|
|25,000 gold increments to a low of 100,000|gold... Sold for 10,000 gold... Note,|however, that if you're playing the demo|
|version, you'll only be able to purchase the|lowest priced S size land... And you can|freely arrange various furniture in your|
|house... You can even invite your friends|over to your house! There's a chest of|drawers to store items, a bed to rest and|
|recover, and furniture with special|functions...

|you want to look up, select the district and|then select "Search from All" to see a list|of all available land. If you select a lot on|
